stringBuilders:
[
    method,
    'https',
    urlObj.hostname,
    `${urlObj.pathname}${urlObj.search}`,
    '', // headers in [k.lower():value] format, but nested scopes not supported
    '', // content hash, but no body needed
    `EG1-HMAC-SHA256 client_token=${C.Secret('akamai_client_token').value};access_token=${C.Secret('akamai_access_token').value};timestamp=${C.Time.strftime(Date.now() / 1000, "%Y%m%dT%H:%M:%S%Z")};nonce=${C.Misc.uuidv4()};`
].join('\t')
